SEARCH
Package game.mission

Class ManualSimulation

java.lang.Object
game.mission.Simulation
game.mission.ManualSimulation
public class ManualSimulation extends Simulation
Class responsible for simulating a manual mission execution. The player can choose their movements and actions while the program handles game logic.

  • Method Details

    • manualSimulation

      public static void manualSimulation(Mission mission, Scanner scanner) throws NoMissionInstantiated
      Simulates the mission gameplay manually by allowing the player to interact with the mission.
      Parameters:
      mission - the current mission to simulate.
      scanner - the input scanner for reading player inputs.
      Throws:
      NoMissionInstantiated - if no mission has been instantiated.

    • printRooms

      public static void printRooms(ArrayUnorderedList<Room> rooms, String message)
      Prints the available rooms with a specified message.
      Parameters:
      rooms - the rooms to display.
      message - the message to display before the list of rooms.

    • selectRoom

      public static Room selectRoom(ArrayUnorderedList<Room> rooms, String message, Scanner scanner)
      Allows the user to select a room from a list of available rooms.
      Parameters:
      rooms - the list of available rooms.
      message - the prompt message for the user.
      scanner - the input scanner for reading player inputs.
      Returns:
      the selected room.

    • playerTurn

      public static boolean playerTurn(Mission mission, Scanner scanner)
      Handles the player's turn and the corresponding actions based on their input.
      Parameters:
      mission - the current mission being played.
      scanner - the input scanner for reading player inputs.
      Returns:
      true if the game ends, false otherwise.

    • handleScenario1

      public static void handleScenario1(Mission mission, Scanner scanner)
      Handles Scenario 1: The player enters a room with enemies and initiates a confrontation. - The player attacks all enemies in the room, dealing damage simultaneously. - If enemies remain alive, they counter-attack the player and remain in the room, while other enemies in the building move randomly.
      Parameters:
      mission - the current mission containing the player and enemies.
      scanner - the scanner used for user input during the scenario

    • handleScenario2

      public static void handleScenario2(Mission mission, Scanner scanner)
      Handles Scenario 2: The player enters a room without enemies. - All Enemies Move Randomly
      Parameters:
      mission - the current mission containing the player and enemies.
      scanner - the scanner used for user input during the scenario

    • handleScenario3

      public static void handleScenario3(Mission mission, Enemy enemy, Scanner scanner)
      Handles Scenario 3: The Enemy enters a room with the Player and initiates a confrontation. - The Enemy attacks the player in the room, dealing damage. - If the player remain alive, they counter-attack the enemy
      Parameters:
      mission - the current mission containing the player and enemies.
      enemy - the enemy that attacks the player
      scanner - the scanner used for user input during the scenario

    • handleScenario4

      public static void handleScenario4(Mission mission, Scanner scanner)
      Handles Scenario 4: The Player uses a health kit. - The Player ends is turn. - All Enemies move Randomly - If the Player does not have items to use the turn is canceled
      Parameters:
      mission - the current mission containing the player and enemies.
      scanner - the scanner used for user input during the scenario

    • attackSequence

      public static void attackSequence(Player player, Scanner scanner)
      Handles the attack sequence during a confrontation when the Player has priority. The Player may attack or use an item depending on their life and backpack availability.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player engaging in the confrontation.
      scanner - the input scanner for player actions.

    • attackSequence

      public static void attackSequence(Enemy enemy, Scanner scanner)
      Handles the attack sequence during a confrontation when the Enemy has priority. The Enemy attacks the Player, and the Player retaliates if still alive.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the Enemy engaging in the confrontation.
      scanner - the input scanner for player actions.

    • enemiesRandomMove

      public static void enemiesRandomMove(Mission mission, ArrayUnorderedList<Enemy> enemies, Scanner scanner)
      Handles random movement for all enemies in the mission. If an enemy moves into the same room as the player, an immediate confrontation occurs.
      Parameters:
      mission - the mission containing the game state.
      enemies - the list of enemies to move.
      scanner - the input scanner for player interactions.

    • printOptions

      public static int printOptions(Mission mission, Scanner scanner)
      Displays the player's options during their turn and validates their choice.
      Parameters:
      mission - the mission containing the game state.
      scanner - the input scanner for player interactions.
      Returns:
      the validated option chosen by the player.
